name: MSI 16 QHD+ (Intel Ultra 7, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, Touchscreen)
description:
Experience the future of computing with the MSI 16-inch QHD+ laptop, designed for power users and professionals alike. Powered by the cutting-edge Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 processor 155H and Intel® Arc Graphics, this laptop is engineered to handle demanding tasks with ease, from content creation to high-end gaming. The stunning 16:10 QHD+ display with 100% DCI-P3 color accuracy and 400 nits brightness brings your visuals to life, whether you're editing videos or streaming content. With a massive 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen4x4 SSD and 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM, you'll experience lightning-fast performance and ample storage for all your needs.

  • Next-Gen Processing Power - The Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 processor, coupled with Intel® Arc Graphics, delivers exceptional performance for multitasking, creative work, and gaming on Windows 11 Home.
  • Immersive Visuals - Dive into ultra-vivid visuals on the 16-inch QHD+ (2560x1600) IPS-Level panel, featuring a 16:10 aspect ratio, 100% DCI-P3 color gamut, and 400 nits of brightness for true-to-life colors and sharp details.
  • Uncompromised Storage and Memory - Enjoy the speed and reliability of a 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen4x4 SSD, paired with 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM, ensuring smooth and efficient performance for all your applications.
  • Stay Connected Anywhere - With Intel® Killer™ Wi-Fi 7 BE1750(w), experience faster and more reliable wireless connectivity, perfect for streaming, gaming, and remote work.
  • Designed for Durability - The laptop features a robust 4-cell, 99Whr battery that keeps you powered throughout the day, complemented by a sleek and durable design that includes a single backlit keyboard and MSI Topload Bag for added protection.
  • Comprehensive Warranty - Enjoy peace of mind with a 1-year warranty, ensuring your investment is protected. *Copilot key feature availability varies by market, see [aka.ms/Keysupport](https://aka.ms/Keysupport) for details.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book3 Ultra (13th Gen Intel i7, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, RTX 4070, AMOLED Touchscreen)
description:
Unleash top-tier performance and vibrant visuals with the Samsung Galaxy Book3 Ultra. Powered by the latest 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-1360P processor, this laptop is designed for both gaming and professional tasks. The 16" WQXGA AMOLED touchscreen display offers an immersive viewing experience with its 3840 x 2160 pixel resolution and stunning color accuracy. Equipped with the NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 graphics, it ensures smooth and high-quality visuals. With 32GB of DDR5 RAM and a 512GB NVMe SSD, you have ample memory and storage for seamless multitasking and quick data access. The sleek Graphite chassis houses advanced technology, including a high-capacity battery and a range of connectivity options.

  • Exceptional Performance - Driven by the 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-1360P processor and 32GB of DDR5 RAM, this laptop provides fast processing and efficient multitasking capabilities.
  • Vivid Display - The 16" WQXGA AMOLED touchscreen delivers breathtaking detail and vibrant colors with a 3840 x 2160 pixel resolution and 400 nits of brightness for an enhanced viewing experience.
  • High-Performance Graphics - NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 with GDDR6 memory ensures smooth and immersive graphics for gaming and creative work.
  • Generous Storage - The 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD offers fast data access and ample space for your files, applications, and media.
  • Sleek and Lightweight Design - The slim and lightweight Graphite chassis combines elegance with portability, making it ideal for both work and travel.
  • Robust Battery Life - A 76 Wh battery supports up to 17 hours of use, providing reliable power for extended sessions.
  • Comprehensive Connectivity - Includes essential ports and connectivity options for versatile and easy integration with your devices.
